title: Electrolyte for lithium ion secondary battery and lithium ion secondary battery

events.title: Application filed by Samsung Fine Chemicals Co Ltd

classifications.description: Accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte characterised by the materials used as electrolytes, e.g. mixed inorganic/organic electrolytes
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Polymeric materials, e.g. gel-type or solid-type

abstract: The invention provides a multi-layered structure electrolyte for a lithium ion secondary battery including positive and negative electrodes capable of intercalating/deintercalating lithium ions, and a lithium ion secondary battery including the electrode. The multi-layered structure electrolyte comprises a gel polymer electrolyte on opposite surfaces of a ceramic solid electrolyte. The electrolyte includes a gel polymer electrolyte on opposite surfaces of a ceramic solid electrolyte.
claims: 1.一种多层结构的电解质，所述电解质用于包括能够使锂离子嵌入/脱嵌的正极和负极的锂离子二次电池，所述多层结构的电解质包括陶瓷固体电解质和设置在陶瓷固体电解质的相反表面上的凝胶聚合物电解质。1. An electrolyte of a multilayer structure, which is used for a lithium ion secondary battery comprising a positive electrode and a negative electrode capable of intercalating/deintercalating lithium ions, the electrolyte of the multilayer structure comprising a ceramic solid electrolyte and being arranged on a ceramic A gel polymer electrolyte on the opposite surface of the solid electrolyte.

2.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，陶瓷固体电解质包括从由Li2S-P2S5、Li2S-P2S5-Li4SiO4、Li2S-Ga2S3-GeS2、Li2S-Sb2S3-GeS2、Li3.25-Ge0.25-P0.75S4、(La，Li)TiO3、Li6La2CaTa2O12、Li6La2ANb2O12、Li2Nd3TeSbO12、Li3BO2.5N0.5、Li9SiAlO8、Li1+xAlxGe2-x(PO4)3、Li1+xAlxTi2-x(PO4)3、Li1+xTi2-xAlxSiy(PO4)3-y、LiAlxZr2-x(PO4)3和LiTixZr2-x(PO4)3组成的组中选择的至少一种化合物，在Li6La2ANb2O12中，A＝Ca，Sr。2. The electrolyte according to claim 1, wherein the ceramic solid electrolyte comprises Li 2 SP 2 S 5 , Li 2 SP 2 S 5 -Li 4 SiO 4 , Li 2 S-Ga 2 S 3 -GeS 2 , Li 2 S-Sb 2 S 3 -GeS 2 , Li 3.25 -Ge 0.25 -P 0.75 S 4 , (La, Li)TiO 3 , Li 6 La 2 CaTa 2 O 12 , Li 6 La 2 ANb 2 O 12 , Li 2 Nd 3 TeSbO 12 , Li 3 BO 2.5 N 0.5 , Li 9 SiAlO 8 , Li 1+x Al x Ge 2-x (PO 4 ) 3 , Li 1+x Al x Ti 2-x (PO 4 ) 3 , At least _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ A compound, A=Ca, Sr in Li 6 La 2 ANb 2 O 12 .

3.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，陶瓷固体电解质包括从由(La，Li)TiO3、Li1+xAlxTi2-x(PO4)3和Li1+xTi2-xAlxSiy(PO4)3-y组成的组中选择的至少一种化合物。3. The electrolyte according to claim 1, wherein the ceramic solid electrolyte comprises (La, Li)TiO 3 , Li 1+x Al x Ti 2-x (PO 4 ) 3 and Li 1+x Ti 2- At least one compound selected from the group consisting of x Al x Si y (PO 4 ) 3-y .

4.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，陶瓷固体电解质包括从由聚环氧乙烷、聚酰亚胺、聚丙烯腈、聚甲基丙烯酸甲酯和聚偏二氟乙烯组成的组中选择的至少一种化合物作为粘合剂。4. The electrolyte according to claim 1, wherein the ceramic solid electrolyte comprises poly(ethylene oxide), polyimide, polyacrylonitrile, polymethyl methacrylate and polyvinylidene fluoride selected from the group consisting of At least one compound is selected as a binder.
5.如权利要求4所述的电解质，其中，粘合剂是聚偏二氟乙烯。5. The electrolyte of claim 4, wherein the binder is polyvinylidene fluoride.

6.如权利要求4所述的电解质，其中，基于100重量份的陶瓷固体电解质，使用0.1重量份到50重量份的量的粘合剂。6. The electrolyte of claim 4, wherein the binder is used in an amount of 0.1 parts by weight to 50 parts by weight based on 100 parts by weight of the ceramic solid electrolyte.
7.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，陶瓷固体电解质的厚度范围为10μm到1000μm。7. The electrolyte of claim 1, wherein the ceramic solid electrolyte has a thickness ranging from 10 [mu]m to 1000 [mu]m.
8.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，凝胶聚合物电解质包括摩尔比为8∶1到16∶1的聚合物和锂盐。8. The electrolyte of claim 1, wherein the gel polymer electrolyte comprises a polymer and a lithium salt in a molar ratio of 8:1 to 16:1.

9.如权利要求1所述的电解质，其中，设置在负极侧的凝胶聚合物电解质包括1wt％到50wt％量的碳酸亚乙酯。9. The electrolyte of claim 1, wherein the gel polymer electrolyte disposed on the negative electrode side includes ethylene carbonate in an amount of 1 wt % to 50 wt %.
10.一种锂离子二次电池，所述锂离子二次电池包括如权利要求1到9中的一项所述的电解质。10. A lithium ion secondary battery comprising the electrolyte as claimed in one of claims 1 to 9.
